column3: 1 add-Extract and add contents of an egg to a microwave-safe bowl
4 Microwave-Microwave for 3 minutes, stirring in between
7 Add-Add 1 tbsp salsa to the bowl
3 Place-Place 8 inch tortilla on a cutting board
5 Add-Add 1/2 tbsp sweet and sour sauce to the bowl
8 Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
9 Pour-Pour egg mixture on top of the tortilla
10 Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 tbsp shredded cheddar cheese on top of the egg
11 Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to another into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps but not so tight that the filling leaks
